content: कौपीनं [कूप-खञ्; see <ls>Sk.</ls> on <ls>P. V. 2. 20</ls>] {@--1@} The pudenda. {@--2@} A privity, privy part. {@--3@} A small piece of cloth (usually a small strip) worn over the privities; कौपीनं शतखंडजर्जरतरं कंथा पुनस्तादृशी <ls>Bh. 3. 101.</ls> {@--4@} (Hence sometimes) A ragged or tattered garment. {@--5@} Sin, an improper or wrong act; <ls>Pt. 3. 97.</ls>
